biotools.summary: BTyper3 is a command-line tool for taxonomically classifying Bacillus cereus group genomes using a novel, standardized nomenclature. Using BTyper3 to Assess the Congruency of a Proposed Taxonomic Framework for the Bacillus cereus group with Historical Typing Methods.

bioschemas.name: BTyper3
bioschemas.summary: BTyper3 is a command-line tool for taxonomically classifying Bacillus cereus group genomes using a novel, standardized nomenclature. Using BTyper3 to Assess the Congruency of a Proposed Taxonomic Framework for the Bacillus cereus group with Historical Typing Methods.
